title: Ackermann Lucky to Escape Serious Injury After Crashing on Pedestrian Crossing in Closing Stretch
content:
The German sprinter lost control as he struck a raised pedestrian crossing within sight of the finish line and was lucky to avoid serious injury.

Read the full article at Ackermann Lucky to Escape Serious Injury After Crashing on Pedestrian Crossing in Closing Stretch on Velo.
author: ahood
